tags.description: The MapComplete theme Benches has a layer Benches showing features with this tag
Layer 'Benches' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches') shows and asks freeform values for key 'backrest'
Layer 'Benches' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches') shows backrest=yes with a fixed text, namely 'Backrest: Yes' and allows to pick this as a default answer.
Layer 'Benches' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches') shows backrest=no with a fixed text, namely 'Backrest: No' and allows to pick this as a default answer.

Layer 'Benches' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches') shows and asks freeform values for key 'survey:date'

Layer 'Benches' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches') shows survey:date= with a fixed text, namely 'Surveyed today!' and allows to pick this as a default answer. Picking this answer will delete the key survey:date.
